name: tm62
effect: Teaches Silver Wind to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Acrobatics to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Silver Wind)

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage.
